      public ResourceCard(int idFront, int idBack, Resource permanentResource, int points, Map<CardCorner,Collectable> frontCorners)
      Constructor for the class.
      Parameters:
      idFront - the id of the front face of the card
      idBack - the id of the back face of the card
      permanentResource - the permanent resource of the card
      points - the points given by the card
      frontCorners - what each front corner of the card contains
